Confirm.Title: Are you sure?
Confirm.Text: You won't be able to revert this!

validation.noScript: Scripts are not allowed in this field
validation.emailPattern: Invalid email format. Please use: ABC@cba.com
validation.mobilePattern: Invalid mobile number format. Please use: 05XXXXXXXX
validation.mobilePrefixPattern: Invalid mobile number format. Please use: +9665XXXXXXXX
validation.mobileNationalPattern: Invalid mobile number. Max 17 digits and should start with 00. Example: 00XXXXXXXXX
validation.invalidUnifiedNumber: Invalid unified number. It should be 10 digits and start with 7. Example: 7xxxxxxxxx
validation.specialCharPattern: Invalid string. Special characters like ~!@#$%^&*()_+<>?/ are not allowed
validation.invalidCRNumber: Invalid CR number. It should be 10 digits and start with 1. Example: 1xxxxxxxxx
validation.agreedToTermsRequired: You must agree to the terms to proceed
validation.lengthRange: The length must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
validation.invalidFileType: This file type is not allowed
validation.invalidBirthDate: Birth date cannot be in the future
validation.ageAbove: You must be at least {{age}} years old
